attributes.action: have phenylalanine band from food and drink
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in nearly all foods and drink no there is and ingrediant called phenylalanine andi think that phenylalanine should be band from being put into all food and drink because to much of it is harmfull to the human body and can kill cells in your body so imagine kids having something to eat and drink and its in there food and drink what will it do to them proberly kill most of there cells off.
